免費石呀！！！
點觸遊戲介面以下地方可獲得數量1、3、5顆不等的石頭。
1.噴水池：出現噴水彩虹
2.街燈：發出彩虹光
3.商店上方卡片：出現禮物汽球
4.垃圾桶：出現強慾之壺
獲得一定時間過後可再次點觸獲得。

DSOD Character Description
Special thanks to Cesco for the translations:

Seto Kaiba
A solitary duelist who fought countless battles with the spirit who resided inside Yugi Muto. In the end he couldn't see his longtime rival leaving this world but even then his tenacity made him build up Duel Links, pushing other duelists to battle it out in this new world.

Mokuba Kaiba
Executive vice-president of Kaiba corporation, he's Seto Kaiba little brother. He often takes the command instead of his busy brother and has grown up a lot both physically and mentally. He supports his brother with Duel Links as the first step of a certain plan.

Unknown Duelist
An outsider who suddenly appeared in the Duel Links world. As the first duelist in Duel Links who can transmit his will strength to his monsters, he overwhelms his opponents using brain waves stronger than ordinary. He keeps destroying the order in the Duel Links world.

Scud
Notorious group of bad guys who attend Domino High School. With Scud as their boss they harass the weak, taking and uploading videos of it on the net.
